Com_Talk_15: <sp:3:0:2:0c00>Sorry, but no. I don't think I can flip that.
Com_Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Sorry, but I'm not going to buy clothes
that you're still wearing. That'd be weird.
StartPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Ever heard of the <clr:0000>god of horses<clr:ffff>?<sp:5:0:0>
He's supposed to be near East Akkala
Stable, northeast of here.
Greeting:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hm?<sp:5:0:0> Oh, it's you... <sp:5:1:0>And so early!
Couldn't wait till after lunch to talk to
me again, huh?
GoalPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I hear the <clr:0000>god of horses<clr:ffff> is around here.
He's a big eater, or so they say.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Guess I'd better whip up a meal for him
before I drop by.
Com_Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think>You're short on rupees... <sp:5:1:0>Plump up your
pockets, then come talk to me.
GoRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The <clr:0000>god of horses<clr:ffff> can make steeds
stronger, they say... Maybe I'll try paying
him a visit.
Com_Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00><snd:Think>Looks like your pouch is out of room.<sp:5:1:0>
Make some space, and then we'll talk.
Talk_2000:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>The only thing putting a damper on my
wonderful day is this darned rain.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0500>Then again, if it's washing away all this
muck, maybe it's a good thing...
SavedLv1_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Ease>Well, I'm still alive.<sp:5:0:0> Guess that counts
for something.
GoRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>I love my mare, but a heavyweight hauler
she is not. If the girl had more muscle,
I could load more onto my wagon.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>The <clr:0000>god of horses<clr:ffff> can make steeds
stronger, they say... Maybe I'll try paying
him a visit.
BackRange_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>My mare, bless her, likes to take it slow.
Think the <clr:0000>god of horses<clr:ffff> could make her
run a little quicker?
GoRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>A horse is every merchant's best friend.<sp:5:0:0>
That's why I reward my dear mare after a
hard day's work.
<sp:3:0:2:0801>She just loves endura carrots. Can't get
enough of 'em.

That <clr:0000>god of horses <clr:ffff>who's supposed to be
nearby... I wonder if he eats them too.
He's a horse himself, right? Or no?
Near_BackRange_01: Pick it up, girl! Come on!
Com_Talk_05b: <sp:3:0:2:0701>I'm happy to buy more stuff off you.
Com_Talk_05d:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you have something to sell, don't hold
out on me.
ShopGreet_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0400>Anyway!<sp:5:0:0> More importantly. I'm open
for business.

<sp:3:0:2:0800>You want to buy or sell anything?
StartPoint_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Say, you ever heard of the <clr:0000>god of horses<clr:ffff>?<sp:5:0:0>
He's supposed to be near East Akkala
Stable, northeast of here.
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>They say he makes horses stronger...<sp:5:1:0> 
Maybe I can ask him to work his magic on
my beloved mare.
Greeting_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hm?<sp:5:0:0> Oh, it's you!<sp:5:1:0> So you trudged through
the rain just to talk to me again?
Greeting_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hm?<sp:5:0:0> Oh, it's you...<sp:5:1:0>again! Couldn't get
enough of my mellifluous voice, huh?
Greeting_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hm?<sp:5:0:0> Oh, it's you!<sp:5:1:0> Couldn't wait until
morning to talk to me again, huh?
Thanks00:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You saw me through alive. Say, any
chance you'd want this?
Talk_3002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hm? Hey, I could see you staring through
the rain... Something up?
GoRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>That <clr:0000>god of horses <clr:ffff>nearby... Do you think
he likes endura carrots as much as my
darling mare?
Com_Talk_11_b: <sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>That was a smart purchase you made.
Talk_3003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hm? Hey, you've been staring for a while
now... Something up?
Com_Talk_11_d: <sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>Thanks. And feel free to buy more.
GoalPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I hear the <clr:0000>god of horses<clr:ffff> is around here.
He's a big eater, or so they say.
Com_Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>When it's raining, I like to mix up my
selection. Take a look-see.
BackRange_02_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I hear <clr:0000>pirates<clr:ffff> have been appearing on the
waters near here. This world can be a
scary place sometimes.
Com_Talk_36:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'm fresh out of stock for the day!
Thanks for buying so much!
Com_Talk_37:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I have to thank you again! You helped me
sell through my entire stock for today.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>While I don't have anything left to sell
you, I'm happy to show you what I plan
to stock!
ShopGreet_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>You know, my favorite part of this job
is all the people I meet.

<sp:3:0:2:0800>It's always fun hearing folks' stories!<sp:5:0:0>
Talk_1000:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Happy_00>It's...it's finally mine! The <clr:0000>towing harness<clr:ffff>
of my dreams!

Took a while to save up enough<clr:0000> Pony
Points<clr:ffff> for it. So many wild horses
registered, so many nights at stables...
But it's all been worth it! Now that I've
got this harness, I can tow to my heart's
content!
BackRange_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I love my horse, but she's not what you'd
call "fast."

You think the <clr:0000>god of horses <clr:ffff>could make
her run a little quicker?
Talk_1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice>You wouldn't happen to be jealous of my
<clr:0000>towing harness<clr:ffff>, would you?
BackRange_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I hear <clr:0000>pirates<clr:ffff> have been appearing on the
waters near here. It's a dangerous place,
this world we live in.
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Folks will probably avoid this area, which
is bad news for my balance sheet.
Talk_1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Like my <clr:0000>towing harness<clr:ffff> that much, do ya?<sp:0:4:0>Then you gotta hit the stables and build
up some <clr:0000>Pony Points<clr:ffff> of your own!<sp:0:4:0>You can earn points by using the stable
facilities, handing 'em new wild horses,
and staying the night there.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Build up enough points and you'll get
your own harness. Then you can pull a
wagon all day long!
I do my trading northeast of here in
<clr:0000>Akkala<clr:ffff>, so come find me if you're nearby.<sp:0:4:0>And hey, spend enough time on the road
and I'm sure we'll see each other again!
RainPoint_01_2:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Rain... It keeps my customers indoors,
exactly where I don't want 'em.
Com_Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Take a look at my wares. <sp:5:1:0>I think you'll
like what you see.
Talk_1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I totally get it!<sp:0:4:0>I mean, if you had a <clr:0000>harness<clr:ffff> of your own,
<clr:0000>your horse could pull a wagon<clr:ffff> or all kinds
of other stuff.
Doing business from a wagon's always
been a dream of mine, me being a
merchant and all.
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I trade around <clr:0000>Akkala<clr:ffff>, to the northeast,
so if you ever pass me on the road,
definitely give me a shout!
Com_Talk_13: <sp:3:0:2:0701>How many would you like to sell?
SavedLv3_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Whew... I'm not in any hurry to run into
one of those again.
